scene.mainElements: busy commercial harbor with tall-masted merchant ships, warehouses lining waterfront, morning mist rising from water
scene.details: coiled ropes on dock, wooden barrels stacked near warehouses, seabirds perched on pilings, morning light reflecting on calm water, cranes for loading cargo silhouetted against sky, no text or letters visible
scene.background: city of Bristol rising on hills behind harbor, church spires in distance, smoke from chimneys
scene.atmosphere: awakening maritime commerce center, promise of adventure in ships preparing for voyages, blend of industry and seafaring life

composition.cameraAngle: elevated wide shot overlooking entire harbor
composition.focus: merchant ships at dock with city backdrop
composition.depth: misty water in foreground, ships and docks mid-ground, city in background
